response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This product is not merely an item; it's a gateway to achieving your goals and enhancing your lifestyle. Given its significance, I propose a special introductory offer of $950,000 for you to consider. This price reflects my confidence in the product's worth and my desire to make this opportunity accessible to someone who appreciates its true value. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
